original_text:
“Will the wild ox consent to serve you?
    Will it stay by your manger at night?
korean_text: 들소가 어찌 기꺼이 너를 위하여 일하겠으며 네 외양간에 머물겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Will the wild ox consent to serve you?
Will it stay by your manger at night?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 밤에 너의 구유 곁에 머물겠느냐?
